00039 // option structures
00040 
00041 
00042 #define DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(_cname,_type) \
00043         class _cname \
00044         { \
00045         public: \
00046                 QString      name; \
00047                 _type        option; \
00048                 int          flags; \
00049         public: \
00050                 _cname(const QString &n,_type o,int f) \
00051                 : name(n), option(o), flags(f) {}; \
00052                 ~_cname() {}; \
00053         };
00054 
00055 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviBoolOption,bool)
00056 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviRectOption,QRect)
00057 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviStringOption,QString)
00058 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviColorOption,QColor)
00059 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviFontOption,QFont)
00060 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviPixmapOption,KviPixmap)
00061 //DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviIntOption,int)
00062 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviUIntOption,unsigned int)
00063 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviMessageTypeSettingsOption,KviMessageTypeSettings)
00064 DECLARE_OPTION_STRUCT(KviStringListOption,QStringList)

00752         #define KviOption_sectMask 255
00753 
00754         // other logical groupings of options
00755         #define KviOption_groupTheme (1 << 8)
00756 
00757         #define KviOption_groupMask (255 << 8)
00758 
00759 
00760 
00761         // actions to take when an option is set
00762         #define KviOption_resetNone 0
00763         #define KviOption_resetUpdateNotifier (1 << 16)
00764         #define KviOption_resetUpdateGui (1 << 17)
00765         #define KviOption_resetUpdateWindowList (1 << 18)
00766         #define KviOption_resetUpdateAppFont (1 << 19)
00767         #define KviOption_resetUpdatePseudoTransparency (1 << 20)
00768         #define KviOption_resetRestartNotifyList (1 << 21)
00769         #define KviOption_resetRestartIdentd (1 << 22)
00770         #define KviOption_resetReloadImages (1 << 23)
00771         #define KviOption_resetRestartLagMeter (1 << 24)
00772         #define KviOption_resetRecentChannels (1 << 25)
00773 
00774         #define KviOption_resetMask (~(KviOption_sectMask | KviOption_groupMask))
00775 
00776         //for file pathes
00777         #define KviOption_encodePath (1 << 25)
